long_description: Amped up with 2 layers of performance-enhancing titanal, Nordica Helldorado skis use a chatter-reducing tip design, 113mm waists and a rockered profile to dominate powder-laden terrain. Full wood core with 2 layers of titanal offers aggressive experts maximum power transmission, torsion resistance, and rebound in all conditions. 113mm waists offer ample flotation, and early-rise tips and tails enhance maneuverability in deep snow. Cambered and rockered profile enhances handling in deep snow, making it easy to take advantage of every feature on the mountain. Standard camber underfoot enhances maneuverability on groomers and variable snow; when weighted, 50% of the ski contacts the snow. Low, broad nose extends over the snow just enough to enhance flotation without becoming really noisy and vibrating on groomed terrain at high speeds. Directional twin-tip taper slightly favors skiing forward, but it also lets you ride switch and land jumps backward. Nordica Helldorado skis feature 113mm waists that require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
